product_name: Swiss Army Day Packer Pocket Knife - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Nice and simple, the Swiss Army Day Packer Pocket Knife has a clip-point blade that easily tackles casual camping tasks for the outdoor enthusiast, whether it's cutting cord or whittling kindling. Stainless-steel 2.5-in. clip-point straight blade. 4-in. handle for a secure grip. The Swiss Army Day Packer Pocket Knife is Swiss made. Closeout.
short_description: Nice and simple, the Swiss Army Day Packer Pocket Knife has a clip-point blade that easily tackles casual camping tasks for the outdoor enthusiast, whether it's cutting cord or whittling kindling.
